name: heuchera
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several different garden and wild plants with round red, purple, or green leaves that grow close to the ground and with many small pink, white, or red flowers on long stems: The foliage ranges from green to purple, accented by the coral-pink flowers of heuchera. The heuchera's large, rounded bronze leaves make a fine contrast to the sharp verticals.
More examplesFewer examplesHeuchera "Palace Purple" has smooth, burnished, brownish-red leaves.Until the 1980s, gardeners tended to grow heucheras for their dainty spikes of red, pink or white flowers.
